decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as non-material amendments to planning permission 232633FUL dated 02/11/2023 for 'Change of use of part of ground floor hotel (Use Class C1) to coffee shop (Use Class E(b)) facilitated by single storey front extension; and associated internal and external alterations including alterations to existing entrance; single storey side extension; and alterations to front façade' in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) due to being contrary to the Ealing Council guidance for non-material amendments.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow Internal alterations of part of the ground floor of the hotel on the proposed coffee shop (Use Class E(b)) facilitated the construction of a new kitchen area and incorporated an emergency exit route/door in relation to planning permission reference 232633FUL dated 02/11/2023 for 'Change of use of part of ground floor hotel (Use Class C1) to coffee shop (Use Class E(b)) facilitated by single storey front extension; and associated internal and external alterations including alterations to existing entrance; single storey side extension; and alterations to front façade'
